text: praqthaqmE mAqsi pRuqShThAnyupa# yanti maddhyaqma upa# yantyuttaqma upa# yantiq tadA#huqryAM ~Mvai trirEkaqsyAhna# upaqsIda#nti daqhraM ~Mvai sA&pa#rAByAqM dOhA$ByAM duqhE&thaq kutaqH sA dhO$kShyatEq yAM dvAda#Saq kRutva# upaqsIdaqntIti# saM~Mvathsaqra(gm) saqpAMdyO$ttaqmE mAqsi saqkRut pRuqShThAnyupE#yuqstad-yaja#mAnA yaqj~jaM paqSUnava# rundhatE samuqdraM ~MvA - [  ] 9
